summary: Simon confirms smaller community members will get a chance in the SAC system
Simon gives info on Hypixel's creator program
mainText: 'We have given out about $3,000,000 to our creators so far through our test program on Hypixel, involving a dozen creators.'

summary: Simon provides some details about the SAC system
mainText:
'Your followers will be able to use your code, so you receive a % of the sales of Hytale. The percentage will be low to begin with, but as we become more comfortable and recoup the acquisition costs, we will increase the %.

If you already have a code on Hypixel, you will keep your code, but will still need to reapply for Hytale.'

summary: Simon announces Support-A-Creator program, details to come
mainText:
'YouTubers and Modders: I am pleased to announce that Hytale will have a Support-A-Creator revenue share program!

If you are interested, please keep an eye on @Hytale. We will be posting information on how to apply in the coming days.'
'We currently have a few options available in that area. We're tracking all the important settings, they'll be added over time'
'We don't have many settings in this area at the moment unfortunately but we'll look into it!'

summary: Simon talks about old beta registration
mainText: 'Most of it was lost in the acquisition, just stay alert on discord / here, we won't do a closed beta, we will just do early access, no beta.'

summary: Simon talks about changing things such as dig speed, tool powers, loot distribution, etc.
mainText:
'Everything you mentioned can be edited while game is running! No need to reboot anything so you can game design as you play (literally what me and designer are doing right now).

Because works gen is complex, we made a visual node editor that will be given to everyone, with turorials/guides'

summary: Simon talks about working on Hytale
Simon says he didn't get any sleep this week

mainText: 'Backpacks help counter the many challenges of having lots of blocks!'
